title.text: HIGH ENERGY SCATTERING OF DIRAC PARTICLES ON SMOOTH POTENTIALS
HIGH ENERGY SCATTERING OF DIRAC PARTICLES ON SMOOTH POTENTIALS

abstract.text: The derivation of the Glauber type representation for the high energy scattering amplitude of particles of spin 1/2 is given within the framework of the Dirac equation in the Foldy Wouthuysen (FW) representation and two-component formalism. The differential cross sections on the Yukawa and Gaussian potentials are also considered and discussed.
